title: feat: add imagen-4, flux-2-dev, grok-video (alpha) via api.airforce
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Added support for Google's Imagen 4, Flux 2 Dev, and xAI's Grok Video (Alpha) via api.airforce.
gist.impact: Users can now generate high-quality images with the latest Imagen and Flux models, plus experiment with Grok's video generation capabilities.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai Bee in a cozy pixel art lab/workshop, presenting three new magical items on a workbench: a colorful prism (Imagen), a swirling energy orb (Flux), and a glowing futuristic video tape labeled 'Alpha' (Grok).
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai Bee in a warm workshop, presenting three new glowing magical artifacts: a colorful prism, a swirling energy orb, and a futuristic video tape labeled 'Alpha'. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
